prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a massive, sleek, alien humanoid warrior, final form, segmented purple and white organic bio-armor, white biological face mask, intense red demonic eyes
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, high contrast lighting, detailed biological plating texture, wet sheen/oily surface texture on armor, volumetric rim light, sharp focus, visible muscle striations underneath armor
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, CGI, plastic texture, smooth armor, metal, chrome, solid block color, flat lighting, deformed anatomy, blurry details, yellow light
